name: AI/ML Feature PRD
description: Machine learning capability delivering predictions or recommendations integrated into product workflows.

sections.title: Overview
sections.content: Business goal, target users, key decisions influenced by model outputs, and success criteria.

sections.title: Dataset & Features
sections.content: Data sources, labeling approach, feature list with data types, privacy considerations, drift risks, and retention.

sections.title: Model Approach
sections.content: Baseline, candidate architectures, hyperparameters, offline training pipeline, feature store usage.

sections.title: Evaluation
sections.content: Metrics (AUC/F1/MAE), test/val splits, segment analysis, fairness metrics, target thresholds and guardrails.

sections.title: Deployment & Monitoring
sections.content: Shadow/canary rollout, rollback criteria, model registry, drift/quality monitors, retraining cadence.

sections.title: Risk & Compliance
sections.content: PII handling, consent, data minimization, explainability, audit logging.
